title: High ping during game
body: So, during a lot of games, since 6.17, I have some high lag spikes (400 to 10k ping) even though my internet connection is going well.  Pingspikes happens randomly but, when there's a teamfight, the game just freeze and, well, I die within a second.  Can someone help me with that? (Sorry for bad english! :s)

replies.body: Even though your internet might seen fine, it can still have problems specifically maintaining a strong connection to the game server.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's happening.  You'll also find a list of troubleshooting steps along with the results specific to your issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
This has been happening to me as well. Normally my ping is around 40-60, but as of late there have been some rather...violently large lag spikes. I'm talking over nine thousand ping level lag spikes.
